name: Sketch Skaters
description:
This game was made for Scribble Jam. It's pretty simple game where you just need to dodge bombs, collect coins, and see just how far you can get. You can use coins to buy new pens, or buy powerups to help you get farther.

Controls:

Space - Use Ink

Mouse - Select from store

I'm hoping to improve this game in the future, so please help me out by dropping some suggestions and comments.
